attributes.action: STOP BSKYB ACQUIRING THE RIGHTS TO SHOW LIVE FOOTBALL MATCHES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Sky Sports (BSKYB) from acquiring all the FA Premier League matches as well as FA Cup etc. Viewers with only Freeview or Terrestrial aren't available to watch these matches.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
